thread.title: Pregnant Beyonce calls out cheating husband Jay Z in Grammys performance
thread.title_full: Pregnant Beyonce calls out cheating husband Jay Z in Grammys performance

title: Pregnant Beyonce calls out cheating husband Jay Z in Grammys performance
text:
"Make the woman in doubt disappear. Her heaven will be a love without betrayal." 
However, she finished her performance on a somewhat hopeful note with: "Now reconciliation is possible. 
"If we're going to heal, let it be glorious." 
Getty QUEEN B: Beyonce's voice filled the arena The Grammys 2017: Hottest outfits Monday, 13th February 2017 Check out the hottest outfits from the Grammys 2017! 1 / 21 
The powerful words come from Beyonce's record Lemonade — winner of the Grammy for Best Urban Contemporary Album — which has a theme of cheating and betrayal. 
The lyrics make reference to a husband cheating on his wife, with Beyonce laying her soul bare in the personal songs. 
However, all seems well between Beyonce and Jay Z now. 
Getty SPECIAL INTRO: Jay Z and Blue Ivy were greeted by host James Corden 
The parents — who will soon be welcoming two new arrivals to the family — put on a united front after the performance. 
Taking to the stage to accept her award for Lemonade, Beyonce said: "I want to thank my wonderful husband." Related Articles
